Posts.Content: Sep 27, 2018 09:03AM OhioMama wrote: It didn’t specify. I’m also worried they may have biopsies the wrong mass. There were a few and close in proximity. A student located the biopsy area and the measurements were a little different
Posts.Title: Biopsy results. Need opinions OhioMama Dmw0813

Posts.Content: OhioMama wrote: Happily it said malignancy not seen but says ductual hyperplasia. I did look that up and it raised questions. Is it possible that the pathologist missed something or something else could appear as this? I just want to make sure that I am advocating for myself and not just brushing something off. My mass had just about every sign of malignancy so that worries me a bit. They are emailing me the actual path report soon Log in to post a reply
